thread.title: Kenya: Cellulant CEOs' Networking Cocktail

title: Kenya: Cellulant CEOs' Networking Cocktail
text:
Kenya: Kenyatta Urged to Cancel US Trip Over Teachers' Strike By Patrick Vidija 
Mobile payments ecosystem Cellulant was the host of the CEO Cocktail Networking event during the 9th Aitec Common Market for East and Southern Africa conference on banking and mobile money. 
The cocktail was held on Tuesday evening at the Pride Inn Hotel in Westlands, Nairobi, and was a welcome break from the day's discussions on security including latest cyber threats to the financial services sector. 
Present at the cocktail were Cellulant Group CEO Ken Njoroge, Aitec Africa chairman Sean Moroney, Serianu MD William Makatiani, Minetec director John Sawers and Tomtom regional sales manager Byron Moorgas. 
This year's conference was themed 'Inspire, Innovate and Implement', and was officially opened by Treasury CS Henry Rotich. Kenya
